name: Brussels Sprouts
properties: Rich in vitamins C and K
Part of Daily Dozen cruciferous vegetables
benefits: Brussels sprouts are cruciferous vegetables that score sixteen out of seventeen optimal weight-loss criteria. They are low in calorie density, have a low glycemic load, and are anti-inflammatory. Part of the optimal weight-loss diet.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - aim for cruciferous vegetables daily

quotes: Most fruits and vegetables would top the list at sixteen out of seventeen [optimal weight-loss ingredients].
